comments.comment: Den bola okkoma baila kiyapalla thopi 226 meda sere eliyata. Ahinsaka duppath janathavage kathiren pathvela ahinsa puravesiya amu amuve gaathanayata lak karapu thopi 226 denama apita epa. Hithanna athi ewa mahajanathvata amathaka vela athi kiyala. Ubalath thama pakshaye jeshtayanta viruddava ne oya kee gahanne. Evain hitha ganna puluva koi kaageth keruvaava. Dinuvath peradunath api meda sere chandaya denne nagananda kodithuwakku mahatma ta bava degaththoth hodai. Aurudu 71 thisse karapu keruvaava athi
comments.author: sanda fernando
